alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Greenbrier, east central Summers and northwestern Monroe Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wolfcreek, or near Alderson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ronceverte... Alderson... Union... Asbury... Pickaway... Wayside... and Raines Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
